lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit, what a way to hold onto the last episode.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, my backyard's water deep, hey, yo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What I'm saying to youse guys is we got room at the table, so if anyone out there is looking to join a cool campaign, shoot me an email, let me give you my email address, ready? (squeaking)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a tail and a fin?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where can I smoke this thing? Can I do it over here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got to go out to the sidewalk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As we know, when political votes start getting really close, people start pulling out all the stops and doing ridiculous things to get your attention, So thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't there a term called jumping the shark?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I miss anything? Did I miss some high quality comedy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was a shark named Paulie that came through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, was it Paulie? Paulie Vincent D'Onofrio?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Autographs, photo op tickets are now available at DenverPopCultureCon.com.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That wasn't part of my announcements--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it was not, but you put it in there anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It says right here, "Sponsor: D&D Beyond" and right under it, it says, "Welcome to the Mile High "Denver Pop Culture Con."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure they were as confused as we were when you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I read what's put in front of me, people! I'm not a mind reader.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Paulie reads what he can see between the teeth of his mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can't-- that wasn't part of the announcement, was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go to DenverPopCultureCon.com for information, looking forward to seeing you guys out there very soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you're here, Sam, why don't you go ahead and tell us about what else is going on? In case you missed it, we released a special animatic preview on April 1st of our animated series the Legend of Vox Machina.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The campaign is still going strong. Right, Travis?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can join it, you can join the campaign to fund this animated series at criticalrole., nope, at critrole.com/animated and now it says here, "Would love to get a little insight "from Sam about how the video came together on stream." I called up Mike Morris.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He put it together, including the designs and also the wacky sound effects and it was awesome and it was a fun little April Fool's joke, but also a fun little taste of a little animated goodness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think I've actually seen that episode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Relatively short announcements this week so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need me to put on the shark costume again just to do some more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How did you come upon our beacon, "and why have you returned it to us?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do not wish to see war, I don't think any of us wish to see war.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "War is upon you whether you like it or not."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We did come here to bring it to you but we have selfish reasons as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'd like to take him back and I'm only hoping that our offering today makes that somewhat easier to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's gotten wrapped up in this whole magic business, but I just want him home with his son.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glances down and the Bright Queen turns and goes, "Shadowhand, can we confirm that there has been some kind of imperial goblin capture?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Shadowhand goes, "Yes, we do indeed have this figure "in our Dungeon of Penance."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's actually pretty nice to hear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is a question you would ask of me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does this mean we'll live here forever now and stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not know the scope and depth of his involvement "with the conflict to the west, but "I'm certain the Shadowhand will inquire "and if there is anything else required, "we will attempt to close our interrogation "and return him to you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so grateful, if there's any way I can repay you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, this request you make is also a paltry gift in "trade for something as, "as incredible as what you brought to us."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you mind sharing with us what it means to your people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We believe there are many more out there "and we aim to find them--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any idea where the fourth one is right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I assume, especially given "the circumstances of one's retrieval, "under very, very close guard somewhere "in the Dwendalian Empire."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is what it's about? These?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There have been conflicts and "bloodshed across our borders with the Empire for some time."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What would it take to end the war?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you trust them? "Do you trust the king, do you trust the people around him?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know many, but I can't say that I am heartened, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We will not stop until we've left "an equal or more share of blood "across the Marrow Valley and beyond."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've told us what it is, but what does it do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I remember the soldier that gave it to us as he was dying said it helps you have babies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (throat clearing) Takes a full minute to clear her throat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want a drink, I have a flask--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When a child is given life within that "same range of the beacon, the spirit is given another life."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Losing a beacon is losing a source "of our cycle of rebirth "and attaining a more perfect soul "to eventually become an Umavi."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "An Umavi is a perfect soul." "One who's lived enough lives to have learned "the secrets to learn the true meaning of why they are here "and to bring a fragment of the Luxon's puzzle to it "when it is reborn, to give it purpose."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean that we were carrying around a whole bunch of souls with us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We also peeked in a few times, into the beacon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is the basis of how we've been able "to free ourselves from the binds "of the lineage the Betrayer Gods left for us "and to carve our own fates, choose our own paths "and sidestep these destinies placed upon us "nonchalantly by gods that use us as playthings."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, this favor, if we can indeed give it, "is comparable to a certain degree, "but is there anything else you would ask? "I do not wish to keep debts."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are moving towards our own destinies and serve our own interests.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To that point, I did notice "that some of you would have a "difficult time traversing Xhorhas." Glances over towards the leather-strap laden humans in the party.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would someone cut these off me, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm genuinely surprised you made it this far."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keep them close, for many would wish to take them "and abuse the access they provide in times of war."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, thank you very much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we will guard them closely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You must have access to powerful magic learning and books?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a talented magic user himself, and maybe one who could be of use to your Dynasty at some point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have been scarred by the few who do not fit that category and rather than kill the entire animal, I ask that you consider cutting the cancer out, so that the whole may live.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we could offer judgment and vindication towards those individuals that are actually involved in wronging you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see this soft, distant thinking expression cross over her face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Consider you might not be at war with the entire Empire? It may be a handful of assholes instead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not a thing that can be found.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We cannot stop it because they will not "and I'm not about to let them have "the first and final strike."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we're to be guests here and find ourselves in your favor, I think it would serve all of us if, perhaps, we knew a bit more about your relationship with the Empire and the world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have many great gifts to have found your way here, "and you have seen many things "that may be helpful in the battles to come, yes? "Will you join us in this struggle "to reclaim our final lost relic of renewal? "And help us punish these insolent murderers "who cut us down and steal our birthright?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we do this, will you halt the attacks that you've been waging on the towns, like Felderwin? At least give us a chance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is something that must pass to keep the balance."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said that two people entered the room behind us before this all started, right? Two other individuals before she got very serious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning there were assistants that came in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we look around and see if anyone is actively casting anything, using anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But nothing that signifies untoward spell casting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the best I can offer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Again, we have things that we are looking for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The fact that we have brought what we have brought to you shows-- I know that you have lived so long-- but I hope shows that our people are able to change and shake off the bonds that they have grown up under.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Through the practical thinking of war.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have each of you been able to "take a passing glimpse into the infinite "might and power of possibility of the Luxon?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all took a gander, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you heard of such a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can't say that I have, but "I can certainly ask around."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope she serves you well when the time comes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you explain its meaning to me a little bit more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those lines are the paths of the souls to infinity "within the Luxon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I would just urge you to consider that a woman so adherent to cycles, I believe you also have the power to break them as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you just ask her if she was on her period?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think that's what she was asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a moment where the Bright Queen, the shoulders shift a bit and a coy grin hits the left side of her mouth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Forgive me if that was too forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Professor Waccoh is still seeking skilled hands :for her projects, perhaps there is good to be done there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going to the prison now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Essek, if you do not mind, take them "to the Dungeon of Penance "through the Shadowshire and see them to the prison."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we start to turn, can I call out to Lythir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stopping part way and looking over his shoulder and going, "Are you following?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you require a moment to speak amongst yourselves? Or?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same antechamber with the fountain and the three cups?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just to check our pants and make sure no one needs a change.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll be on the other side. Knock when you're ready."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there, like, listening devices in here? You guys monitoring us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They come to a close and you have, for an undisclosed period of time, it seems, privacy here within the antechamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cast Detect Magic? The only bit of magic that you find at this point is amongst your group and the items you're wearing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing seems to be, nothing mystical happening in this place, so I think if they are listening, they're listening with the old cup and string.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go around to some corners and throw some liquid around, see if it splashes on any invisible people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just did a Detect Magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but they might have been--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a splashy water investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would not recommend that in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly as we totally thought it would happen, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think that was our first choice of an ending, but it is one we discussed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And now we have an ally that we wouldn't have had otherwise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to talk at length and I don't know if we can do it here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think, perhaps, here is the place but we can at least--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wish we had a bit more of a chance to explore the, the soul box, as it were.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But knowing what we know now, I don't know that we could have done anything with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do we know now? What she told us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think she was telling the truth and I think we'll learn more just by walking this place at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, fuck. Who knows what we're in the middle of now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of have a feeling like our current plan of pissing in the wind and then using that to decide our direction might not work so much anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Wildmother spoke to me while I was in the cave and she thinks we're going the right direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to where we're needed, our destiny awaits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're now in the place where any writings that exist on it would be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speaking of not having any plans, I'm more disappointed in us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were asking questions to the people we were trying to deceive, things that we should have already known.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm actually pretty good at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, we're just a couple of people that were wandering around and found you guys and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was trained in it, you're right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would you have done differently? How would you have learned about them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everywhere that we went, you and I were not welcome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They seem to be pretty guarded in their secrets and their rituals and their relics.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm not agreeing to the slave thing anymore because that was stupid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, fair enough, no more of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some people are really into that stuff, I'm just putting it out there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Under different circumstances, it might have been enjoyable. In a place where it was literally robbing me of my voice, not super cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry I put my feet on your back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The first time in a very long time, I feel hopeful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep the frown on, keep the frown, don't break!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if I'll ever see my mom again because the choices made in that room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you want to see your mother, I can get you back to your mother pretty soon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of goes for a lot of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we have, if we play it right, very strong allies, and things that were impossible yesterday are possible today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think your allies here are owed a little bit more of an explanation, Hope-Bringer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should be celebrating the good news that we're going to recover Yeza.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She didn't say that we could take, she just said see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm also now kind of nervous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has he seen you like this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would it be helpful if, when you first spoke to him, you looked like you used to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it possible that, perhaps, this is a bandage that should be pulled at some point?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I don't know. I mean, it's a rough scab.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not going to heal right--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he hate goblins as much as you did?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what might soften the blow a little bit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I sent him a message and let him know, hey, P.S., she doesn't look quite like you remember her, but, you know, she's still your wife, she loves you very much, and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, that's not a terrible idea, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just plant the seed, let it grow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll use a lot of magic, but we're willing to do it for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you'll never be alone in a room again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it now, is it five minutes from now? Do we have to travel across the country to see him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he's probably downstairs, or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we in-- where are we? Are we in Ghor Dranas right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rosohna is their name for it, Ghor Dranas is our bastardized name for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember we took a teleportation circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Ghor Dranas is the name for the location as it was the capital for the Betrayer Gods during the Calamity up to the Divergence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't want it to be Betrayer Gods anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See, that's just extra, that's extra info.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, maybe give him a headsy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're nervous about where we are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, the former capital of where the Betrayer Gods were during the Calamity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then they changed the name, so maybe they didn't like them either.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure there was nothing left behind after that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, don't judge people based on, you know, their parents. Some people--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Understandable, but I think the Bright Queen was pretty cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This version of the Bright Queen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That you mean she's got 1200 lifetimes, well, no, that would be very short lives.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was a fan of the previous Doctor Who series.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From what I've read, she could also probably have killed us all herself without any help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she's really strong, I would assume.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could have done Wall of Fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Over a thousand years of training is pretty top notch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No wonder her armor is cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we let him know that we'll feel free to move--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if she would give us some, like, armor or diamonds or, like, gem dust, or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would not say no to another diamond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go back and ask for stuff and for jewels now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perhaps not directly to her, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they have work for us, so we can maybe earn a little something and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like, perhaps, if we start doing our good work here things will manifest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That pen is fucking dope, Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While she's casting, I'm going to start getting drunk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no! I pull whatever you're drinking down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you don't! (slapping) I smack her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't need this! You're all the woman you need to be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It did almost nothing to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing at all! How do you even hold the falchion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no. Don't make Fjord cry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You made fun of his tennis wrist, come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't want to be drunk the first time you see him again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was drunk the first time we--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guess what? We're here! But Nott needs to let you know she looks a little different.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to use all the words.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're on our way, you got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should cast it on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Polymorph, you want to make me a griffin or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, can't we make you look like you used to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make me look like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if you cast disguise on you, then when he touches you, he'll know that you have these ears and stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It might be nice to ease him into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You turn yourself into you and be like, "So I have a thing." Or maybe even introduce through touch first, you know, one--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One sensory overload at a time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're just going to slowly turn up the temperature on the situation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then like, your lower jaw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys'll just be creepily watching all this happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to be filming it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's happening, we're doing this. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or should you do it when we get closer because it lasts for what, an hour?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How far away is the dungeon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd say about, by foot, an hour's travel at most."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so maybe wait just a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, follow me." He turns around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we do an insight check on him and make sure that this guy's not going to turn on us and just throw us in jail and be like, "Fuck you guys."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good thing I can cast the Sending on Leylas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, he's definitely planning something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is not true! That was a mistake! They are everywhere, though, everywhere that you have your tablet device and a login.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you can get D&D Beyond in any nation of the world as long you have access to internet and an excitement for the joys of D&D.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, follow me." He turns around and continues to walk. "Now--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's curious, but comfortable, not too chill.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why is it so dark outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So as part of our craft, we've found a way to "keep it at bay, for as long as we'd like."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How high does this darkness rise?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The correct stars, in the sky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's as if there was no sun at all above you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So not a different sky. It's this sky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just through a lens of dunamantic magic."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do we call you, just Shadowhand? Or is there another name you prefer?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Den Thelyss is, like, the most popular one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's one of the top three, is that right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it impolite, forgive me if it is, to ask how many years you have been through the bop-bop beacon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Interestingly enough, "while I am consecuted, I have not "gone beyond the first life yet."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The den was very kind to accept me "for one as comparably young as myself, "I'm only partway into my second century, so."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would be a great honor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On top, you can see riders scanning the skies, about 12 of them, keeping watch over the vicinity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's one each if we decided to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something is subtly influencing you to make it difficult to really trace the path you take to where you're going.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: Let's turn in for the night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all prepare yourselves for an evening's rest, you having flashes of the imagery that you received in your brief time no longer within your mortal coil and the unresolved tension between the accidental death that found its way to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I ain't dropping lore on you yet, man, it's been a long game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything you guys wish to do before you turn in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use whatever means necessary to completely black out the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll tuck him into his bed and I'll lie down on the floor next to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It weirdly feels better, but I also wanted to give you your space.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I give him all the pillows and blankets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He passes back out again, but curled up next to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll stroke his little hair and watch him sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the rest of you find yourselves--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab Fjord before we leave the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I'm checking, I'm like what are you going to do before we close here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you okay? You all right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry I was a little cagey, past, you know, few hours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was about to say-- Not really sure what exact incident you are apologizing for but it's all just Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are going to be fed every manner of story and lie and propaganda that these people know and have, and we are somehow supposed to divine the truth from BS.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess it's a good thing we have some of the best detectives on our side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go pass out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When Fjord re-enters the room, Caleb is pulling a silver wire around the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Later, as they're drifting off, he hears: Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sometimes you have to get a little bit crazy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean, right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uh. No, you said that to me once.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This went worse than I imagined it. Good night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It took a brass pair to do what you did, so thanks for not, you know, getting us killed, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, when I see my friends on the verge of possible death I'm not going to stand by and do nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to go to sleep now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I stay awake in bed for another 30 minutes and scratch Frumpkin's neck and then pass out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think they're doing right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeza and Vess, Veth? Veth, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Veth. That's what she was named.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, Yeza looked pretty fucked up, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he ate a lot, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he did. I bet he barfed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But not in a way that's like, "Did you throw up "because she is a goblin?" because that's not cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no, just because he ate too much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me, too. He seemed like he really, really loved her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would've beaten his ass if he was a piece of shit about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, it's funny because, like, you know, we read all these books and stuff and that's not at all the way love is described in the books that we read.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mean the porn books that we read? Those?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, are they like porn, though, or are they just like the way relationships are for real, though?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester learned about romance from porn, oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I'm here to fix your pool." "I don't have a pool." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear Yasha's voice in the dark go, "You-- "are you okay?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, yeah, I'm-- certainly real now, isn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: you think that's a little dangerous?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think there's a great version of all these people and of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hopefully I won't get everybody else killed too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hopefully we won't get you killed either, not again."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Think I need to talk to the Wildmother again soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think I have to talk to my own "interested party, as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would very much like to know what they say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for taking care of these people with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just paying forward how "one of them once took care of me."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the shuffling of a pillow being pushed over Yasha's ears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering) We'll go ahead and roll hit points real fast here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's so important for me, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you roll your hit die, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a six on the floor, can I take it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Goddamn it! It's a six in the board!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got a five too, not too bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're so angry when you roll well!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe your modifier already gets added, so just put the number you rolled.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You change your rolled HP, you add it to your roll of your HP.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you add it to your rolled HP.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, I'm all of 57 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think for some of you guys, that's-- I think it's 5th-level spells, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do some crazy stuff now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got Mass Healing Word now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whole party goes down, (snaps) whole party comes back up as long as you guys don't wander 60 feet in front of everybody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you about to sunset us for the night?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I do one thing in the morning?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just a talk, just a conversation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does everyone finish their input? You good, you good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you please, could I borrow you for a moment? Is she awake?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lead downstairs and find it's like crack of dawn kind of thing here, even though there's no sun, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be like because you guys went to sleep not too late in the evening, be close to like six or seven in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the dining area deserted at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them looks like they maybe have passed out at the table, the other is currently sitting and finishing an early breakfast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lead Beauregard to the opposite, as far as I can get from these two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yo, why did you get me up so early?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, last night, it seemed like I did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would hurt real bad, man, if that was the case.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry for anything that I have done in the past that has earned your distrust.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two pieces of shit like us doing some good?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We get to make ten episodes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight episodes through the Briarwood arc. Ahh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And an Ashley Johnson one shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What will it be? What will it be?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say: a mysterious woman covered in tattoos.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't we get her back next week?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not make any promises we can't keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much and is it Thursday yet? Good night, guys! [dramatic music]
